name: Tanks A Lot
description:
Tanks A Lot is a like parkour in a tank!

You play drive, jump, wall jump, fire and boost across a variety of levels in your squashy green tank, but wait! The big difference with Tanks A Lot is every jump, wall jump and shot you fire breaks the level more and more.

Can you get the gold on each level?

Features:

  • 9 levels
  • levels get destroyed as you play
  • Retro synth tunes

#indiegame #tank #retro #2d #puzzle #precision
